ref: 848 *avaśara ʻ protection, shelter ʼ. 2. *avaśāra -- . [For semantic change to ʻ roof, veranda, porch ʼ cf. esp. śaraṇá -- . G. ɔ -- points to initial apa -- . In view of Pa. Pk. words derivation from apasā̆ra -- (Bloch LM 303, ND 63 b 10) is semantically unsatisfactory; these words also rule out conn. with upaśāla -- n. ʻ courtyard before a house ʼ Kauś. -- √śar]
Pa. ōsaraka -- ʻ affording shelter, overhanging (of eaves) ʼ;
Pk. ōsariā -- f. ʻ part round the outside of the door, terrace ʼ;
G. ɔsrī f. ʻ steps at entrance door, front portion of house ʼ;
M. osrī f. ʻ veranda or unwalled space in front of or behind central part of house ʼ.
